Title: Sliding Bobs
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Gregory Thompson, Mike Benner (story editor)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: When Bob starts to lose his hair, Linda reminisces about his mustache and how it made her fall for him; the kids make up their own versions of how Bob and Linda met.
